hadiths.text: Narrated Sahl bin Sa`d:I witnessed a husband and a wife who were involved in a case of Lian. Then (the judgment of) divorce was passed. I was fifteen years of age, at that time

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ قَضَى وَلاَعَنَ فِي الْمَسْجِدِ
chapter.eng-name: Whoever gave judgements of Li'an in the mosque
